It's Saturday so she sleeps in.

Going on Patrol as SneezeGirl
Something else
1.content:
Four robbers came running out of a bank, each carrying large bags of cash.

“Let’s vamoose.” one of the robbers said.

"Not so fast" said a voice

The robbers looked to see a teenage girl in a red leotard. She had a red cape and a red mask covering her eyes. The letters "SG" were on her chest.

"It's SneezeGirl" the robbers said in unison

"You should know better than rob banks in this town" she said "Don't you know that I'm allergic to crime?

"Shoot her" one of the robbers shouted

They pulled out their guns and aimed them at the heroine. She inhaled deeply, her nostrils stretched out and sucked in the weapons.

"Our guns" one of them said

"Ah....Ah....AH-CHOOOOOO!"

She sneezed with tremendous force. The guns flew out of her nose and the robbers flew back into a wall. She sneezed again sending a thick stream of snot over them, cementing them to the wall. She wiped her nose on a corner of her cape as people around her cheered.

"That should keep you there until the police arrive" she said

The bank workers took the money back inside and waited for the police to come.

"Thank you for everything SneezeGirl" one of the workers said

"It's all in a day's work" she said "Now I'm off....Ah....Ah.....AH-CHOOOOOO"

She sneezed herself into the air and went flying through the sky. After a few minutes of being airborne, she landed safely in front of a house. She dove into some bushes, changed clothes, and went inside.

"Just in time for dinner" Jane said to herself.

The next day.......
1.title: Chapter One

choices: Jane has an allergy attack
Jane excuses herself from class
Jane tries to make it through class without sneezing
11.content:
Jane stepped off the bus and started to walk the short distance up to the front doors of her school. She was just a sophomore in high school, not exactly on top of the food chain, but Jane had always been self-confident. Jane had plenty of friends and not many people made fun of her, and even when they did, she always did her best not to let it bother her. However, there was one thing that always did manage to get on her nerves. It was peak allergy season, all the huge amount of pollen in the air was making bothering Jane's nose. She continued forward, but she started to frown at the sudden itch in her nose. Jane rubbed her index finger back and forth under her nostrils, trying to deaden the irritation.

Luckily for Jane, allergy attacks didn't always end in disaster. If she could keep her sneezes small, they wouldn't activate her powers and no one would catch on to her secret identity. However, if she did succumb to a powerful enough sneeze, she might accidentally end up using one of her sneeze powers and blowing her cover. On top of all that, if she had an allergy attack when she did want to use her powers, it would make them very difficult to control. Thankfully, she managed to get inside quickly before too long, and the school's air conditioning started to soothe her nose.

Not worrying about her allergies anymore, Jane made her way to her first class. Chemistry, not her favorite, but she still did her best to enjoy it. She sat down in her usual seat along the wall farthest from the door and next to one of her friends. However, her nose suddenly started to itch again. Jane looked around for the cause and finally noticed that the window right next to her seat, the window that was always closed, was actually open for once.
11.title: Starting off at school

choices: Jane manages to get through the attack with just normal sneezes
Jane feels a super-sneeze coming
Jane decides to leave the classroom
111.content:
Jane decided that it would be safest to get up and close the window before the teacher arrived. But just as she placed her hand on it to swing it closed, a gust of wind loaded with pollen surged through, and she couldn't help taking in more than her nose could take. She pushed the window shut even as she began to lose control of her breathing, and she hurried back to her seat where she kept a small supply of tissues, face contorting as her breath hitched.
"ehh... ahhh... aaAHH..."
She fumbled for a tissue and brought one to her nose just in time to catch the first sneeze.
"Atischoo! Ah-AH- AHCHOO! ACHOO! heh..eh.. ih- Asishoo!"
Jane was trying to restrain her sneezes as best she could, but some of them were coming so hard on the heels of the sneeze before them that she barely had time to gasp a breath, let alone reduce the power of the sneeze that followed. And she didn't dare fully stifle them, not only because the power of the sneezes would hurt her, but because she didn't want to trap the pollen inside her nose for any longer than necessary.
She blew her nose, hoping to clear some of it out, but she could sense the futility of it. Already she could feel the next wave of sneezes building, her nose feeling almost like a separate entity as it twitched and flared, desperate to expel the irritants dancing within it. There was only one thing that could happen next.
"Ah.. ah...ihh...eehhh...."
111.title: Jane has an allergy attack

choices: Jane feels a snot storm coming on
Class continues as normal
1111.content:
Jane readied her handkerchief and smothered her nose in it.

"AH-CHOOOO!" Jane felt relief wash through her nose. "AH-CHOOOOO!"

Normal sneezes. Thank goodness. Well, normal by SneezeGirl standards, anyway. Jane's regular sneezes still dwarfed that of any of her classmates. "AH...AH...AHHH...CHOOOOOOOOO!" This one was a bit wetter than the others.

Jane tucked the handkerchief into her pocket and gave a sniff of pride, smiling. Not every super-sneezer could hold them back that well.
1111.title: Jane manages to get through the attack with jus...

choices: Jane has another super-sneeze
Jane leaves her mess for someone else to deal with
Jane does her best to clean up before heading back to class
1112.content:
This one was going to be bad. Jane could feel it, building up in her sinuses. Rushing up to the front desk, Jane grabbed a whole handful of tissues and shoved them over her nose. Then she made a dash for the door, hoping to get away before anything awful happened. Keeping the mess of tissues clamped over her nose, Jane sprinted out of the classroom and into the bathroom, which luckily wasn't too far away. Locking herself in the stall by the window, Jane got ready to let it all out.


"Aaahhhhh... Haaahhhh... AAHH-CHHHOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!"

A mess of sticky snot blasted out of Jane's nostrils. The tissues were nowhere near enough to contain it, and the snot ended up covering the inside of the stall. A bit of it was even still stuck to Jane's nose. She broke it off from the walls and sniffled it back up her nostrils. This made her nose very stuffy, but it would go away eventually as her body reabsorbed the snot for future use.
1112.title: Jane feels a super-sneeze coming

choices: It's a Super Sneeze
It's a Booger Blast or Snot Storm
11121.content:
Despite all the snot, though, it seemed that Jane's nose still hadn't dealt with all the irritants she had breathed in. She got off a couple of normal sneezes, catching the mess in some hastily-gathered toilet tissue, and wound up for a third, but it was stuck.
"hhh... un- unfaiehh... unfair." Jane kept the toilet tissue hovering by her face as she gasped, waiting.
"Ahhhhh.... Ahhhh...uh. Ahhh...aaaaahhhh...ehhhhhh...guh. Wuh... huh...heh...heh...heh..." the sneeze built agonisingly slowly, each build-up bringing her a little closer to relief. But as it grew, Jane suddenly felt her powers beginning to stir. She tried to keep them from fully activating, but to no avail. This was going to be bad, and what was worse, Jane realised, was that, with the teasing build-ups confusing her, she couldn't be certain which of her powers was going to manifest itself.
"eehhhh... Ahh...Ahhhh....Ahhhhh....AHHHHH...." Jane's eyes squeezed shut. She pressed a finger to her nose, hoping to buy herself some time, but her touch just pushed the quivering appendage over the edge.
"aaaAAHHHHHHHHHH... ACHHOOOOOOOOOOOO!"
11121.title: Jane has another super-sneeze

choices: Reporters come to interview the students
A super villain comes disguised as a new teacher
111211.content:
Jane hadn't felt any snot coming out of her nose as she sneezed, and that only worried her more. When she opened her eyes, she saw to her horror that she hadn't blasted a wave of snot all over everything. At least that wouldn't have caused any damage. Instead, Jane's super sneeze blew the stall door right off its hinges, and everything in the bathroom on the other side of it was completely smashed. One of the sinks was split in half, its broken faucet spurting water into the air.

"Oops..." Jane said, placing her finger under her nose. After giving her nostrils a rub, she slipped out the bathroom window. Unfortunately, there was simply no way this would go unnoticed. No one would be able to pin it directly on Jane right away, but things were going to get messy. Once word got out, someone would inevitably come looking for Sneeze Girl...
111211.title: It's a Super Sneeze

choices: He could control people- by painting a portrait of them doing something.
He could turn people to stone, and shape stone freely, without tools.
1112112.content:
Meanwhile, in the administrative offices, there was a meeting going on welcoming a new teacher to the school.

"We're very happy to have you as our new Art teacher, Mr. Frieze. But tell me... um... if I may be so bold..." the principal was beating around the bush, not wanting to offend this highly qualified new employee.

Mr. Arthur Frieze was a good-looking gentleman, with short, well-groomed platinum blond hair, sparkling blue eyes, and a well sculpted face that would probably earn him a fan club with the female students. He was also pretty evil, but he generally kept that to himself. You see... he liked to make art out of... questionable materials. He had a power, as well...

"Yes? Don't be shy, what is it?" He flashed the principal a bright smile. "It's about my name, isn't it?"

"Well..." The older man blushed. "Yes."

Frieze nodded, understanding. "My family boasts a love of art and architecture all through our history, and at some point, someone decided it might be a good idea to change our surname."

There was another reason for that, though. You see, Mr. Frieze's power was...
1112112.title: A super villain comes disguised as a new teacher

choices: Jane tries to stop Mrs. Garland's sneezes
Jane investigates what's making her sneeze
11121121.content:
In fact, that was how he'd been hired at this school to begin with. He'd painted each of the senior faculty agreeing to hire him, and so it had come to pass. He'd destroyed the paintings once the task was complete, otherwise they'd all be doing nothing but agreeing to hire him for the rest of their lives, but the task at hand was completed. Now all that remained was to find Sneeze Girl...

After the staff meeting, Mr. Frieze headed to his private office. He was confident no one would disturb him there, and even if they did, no one would suspect anything if they simply saw him painting a portrait. After setting up a small canvas to work on, Mr. Frieze got to work. He recalled one of the teachers from memory as best he could, and he began to paint her in the midst of a sneezing fit...

Meanwhile, Jane sat in class, feeling bored. For once, her own allergies weren't acting up, and she took this as an opportunity to relax and savor her clear head. She knew she should have been paying attention, but she was just too tired after all the crime fighting and super-sneezing of the past week. Jane sighed, feeling tempted to fall asleep at her desk, but she was suddenly distracted by the sound of someone else sneezing.

"Ah-Ahh-Ahhh! AH-CHOOO!"

Jane looked up to see her teacher sneeze as she was writing something on the blackboard. Assuming she had just inhaled some chalk dust, Jane didn't think anything of it and tried to fall asleep again.

"Ah-Ahh! AH-CHOOO!" The teacher sneezed again, more quickly this time.

"Bless you, Mrs. Garland!" one of the other students called out. However, Mrs. Garland didn't respond as she was overwhelmed by yet another sneeze.

"AHH-CHOOO!"

A few students giggled, finding her sneezing fit amusing, but eventually everyone started to feel a little concerned. Mrs. Garland had been sneezing for almost 5 minutes continuously, and she just wouldn't stop.

"AH-CHOOO! AHH-CHOOO! AH-CHOOOOOOO!"

Eventually the bell rang and most of the students left. Jane, however, found this awfully suspicious. As she packed up her books, she tried to decide what to do...
11121121.title: He could control people- by painting a portrait...

choices: When they get back, Mrs. Garland is fine.
On the way, she notices something...!
111211211.content:
"Mrs. Garland... are you all right?"

"AH---CHOOOO!" Mrs. Garland let out another sneeze in response. Jane was worried now... there was definitely something wrong.

"Mrs. Garland, you have to stop sneezing!" She squeezed her teacher's nose shut, but Mrs. Garland kept right on going. "AH-CHMMP! AH-CHHHMPH! AH-CHHOOO!" She sneezed her way free of the restraining hand.

Seeing that there was really nothing she could do, Jane left to go get the school nurse.
111211211.title: Jane tries to stop Mrs. Garland's sneezes

choices: Jane's next class is with Mr. Frieze
Jane's next class is P.E. and her allergies act up
1112112111.content:
Jane rushed back into the classroom with the school nurse right behind her, but for some reason, Mrs. Garland's sneezing had stopped. The teacher was sitting on the edge of her desk, blowing her nose into a handkerchief, but otherwise she looked fine.

"Mrs. Garland, are you okay?" Jane asked, not certain this was over. Her teacher nodded, smiling weakly.

"I'm fine, Jane," Mrs. Garland said, wiping her nose and then putting her handkerchief away. "Thank you for bringing the nurse, but I'm alright. I must have just inhaled some chalk dust."

Not wanting to seem strange, Jane nodded in agreement and left the classroom. She still didn't believe that was just random; given her super powers, she tended to take anything sneeze-related as a sign. However, there was nothing she could do about it now, especially since she had to get to her next class.
1112112111.title: When they get back, Mrs. Garland is fine.

choices: Jane desperately has to release a snot storm, find a place to hide!
Jane somehow manages to hold back her allergic fit through the entire class.
11121121112.content:
As Jane went down the hall she remembered what class she had next; outdoor P.E. This was not good at all. Just the thought of going outside made the poor girl's nose twitch. Having finally arrived at the changing room she sighed and gave her nose a rub, praying to god that it would be on it's best behavior.

After a few moments she was changed and headed out with every other student. The very second the doors opened to the outdoors Jane could feel her nose preparing to go into a frenzy. She could almost see all the specks of pollen dancing in the sunlight and her nose was already inhaling as many tiny grains as it could.

"C-c'mon... just hold out until this is over... please!" she pleaded with her nose but it seemed that twitching organ on her face was having none of that. SHe coudl already tell she was getting all bonged up with super snot. In front of her she noticed some guys and girls glancing back and muttering about how red her nose was getting, some statements being words of pity and others of mocking insults. For the students mocking her she almost wished she could sneeze herself silly on them and show them what for... and honestly with her nose begging to purge itself of these irritants this didn't seem impossible

The first exercise was jogging around the track. With the in her face Jane's nose almost in agony as it just sniffled and sucked in more and more pollen.
11121121112.title: Jane's next class is P.E. and her allergies...

choices: It was Mr. Frieze!
It was the assistant coach from PE!
111211211121.content:
Jane jogged dutifully around the track, shoving her finger beneath her nose, desperate to keep the snot storm she knew was building safely inside her nose. But the allergies were... making her feel... like she couldn't...

It was imminent. There was no way she was going to stop the snot storm from blasting out. She looked ahead of her... saw the four or five students that she would cover in sticky slimy snot. At this angle, she calculated instantaneously, they'd be thrown to the fence on the far side of the track... it would take forever to get them down... she couldn't she just couldn't release the snotty sneeze on her classmates, even if some of them were jerks.

But neither could she stop the sneeze from coming... it kept buzzing in her nose, tingling, twitching, swirling... there was no way she could stop it, not now, not when she'd had such an allergy-filled day, not when the pollen was swirling around her, so thick she could see it in the light...

"hiiiihhhhhhhh... hhiiiiiiiiihhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh..." she swerved wildly away from the track, distantly hearing an assistant coach yell, "Hey! Marigold! Where do you think you're..." But she could barely hear anything, barely focus on anything besides the growing feeling that she was going to sneeze a great big snot storm, and the feeling of all that gooey congestion filling up her nose, and her sinuses, felt like her whole body...

"yyyyyyyiiiihhhhhhhhhhhhhh... aaaaaaahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh... hahaahahhahahhhhhhahhhh"

Suddenly, she saw it: a gap in the fence! She could use it to escape into the small creek beyond, where she could blast out her snot storm without worry. Racing against the powerful irritation in her nose, she slipped through the fence, ran down to the edge of the creek and...

""WWWWWWAAAAAAAAASSSSSHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHEEEEEWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWW!" The snot sprayed and sprayed as the long blast of her sneeze continued, and she let it go freely, spraying wildly from her nose with abandon. She covered a huge swath of ground in sticky snot, sprayed all around, sticking together grass and flowers and trees and bushes and rocks... but, thank goodness, none of her classmates.

But just when she was sure she was in the clear, she heard and throat clear and realized... someone had been watching her...
111211211121.title: Jane desperately has to release a snot storm, f...

It was the new Art teacher they'd announced this morning... what was his name? Jane couldn't remember, and it didn't particularly matter to her at this point. She quickly turned away again, hiding her face- he couldn't possibly know her name, and maybe if she could get away... she sprinted off, needing to get as far from the man as possible.

"Well, well... one of the students here is Sneeze Girl... what an amusing development." He began to chuckle as he surveyed the surroundings- he didn't know her name... but he knew her face! And with that, he could easily paint her... control her... and use those sneezes of hers for his own purposes.

"This is my lucky day, isn't it?" He turn and strode back toward the school, his lunch break nearly finished. "What a fortuitous time to take a stroll."
1112112111211.title: It was Mr. Frieze!

choices: Jane does a danger sneeze
Jane does some other sneeze
11121121112111.content:
Jane came running back where the gym instructor was waiting not looking very happy, "Why did you just run away like that?" the instructor shouted.

"Um, sorry about that," Jane said trying to sound confident, "But I, I, Sneezegirl! Yeah that's who I saw, Sneezegirl."

"You expect me to believe Sneezegirl was around here?" The instructor said.

"Well c'mon I'll show you." Said Jane.

Jane took the instructor to where all the snot still was. Some of the other students followed as well.

"See," Jane showed them, "Snot everywhere."

The other students starred in awe, "Wow!" one said, "You mean Sneezegirl did all that?"

"Of course," Jane chuckled nervously, "Who else could have?"

The gym instructor was calmer now, "Well I know how exciting it is to see Sneezegirl in action, but from now on never run off like that even if it is her."

"Sure, no problem." Jane said. Everyone then headed back to class.

"Wow, Sneezegirl!" One of Jane's friends said, "Can you imagine what it must be like to be her?"

"Yeah, I think I could." Jane said.


Later on Jane was getting her lunch from the cafeteria counter and joined some of her friends at the usual table where they sat.

"Wasn't that awesome to find out Sneezegirl was actually here at the school?" Her friend Debbie said. "Wouldn't it be something if she was a student?"

"Yeah, right." Jane's other friend Kim laughed. "Someone like Sneezegirl would go to an ordinary school like this."

Jane was about to agree with Kim when she let out a small gasp as she felt the buzzing, tickle feeling in her nose again and then....

She hummed as hard as she could and the vibrations caused her nose to tickle badly as she ripped fourth a sneeze. "KAAAAAAAAAAAAA, KAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA, KAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA-CHIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIOOOOOOOOOOOO OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!"

1121211211.content:
SneezeGirl ran out into the street just in time to see the robbers running away. She ran after them as fast as she could, but they were pretty quick on their feet and it was hard for her to catch up. Eventually, the robbers ran into an abandoned building on the far side of town. It was probably their hideout, so SneezeGirl slowed down and tried to follow them quietly.

As soon as she headed inside the building, SneezeGirl wished she had a gas mask. The air inside was extremely dusty, probably because the building hadn't been maintained in years. The dust was already starting to make her nose itchy, and she hoped she wouldn't sneeze. Even a small sneeze would give her away, so she had to make sure she didn't sneeze even once. SneezeGirl rubbed her nose with her index finger, trying to make her nose stop itching. She could hear voices up ahead, so she didn't have to go much farther.

11212112111.content:
SneezeGirl tried to breathe as little as possible as she crept through the dusty passageway. It seemed to be working for now- her nose’s reaction was limited to a steady tingle. She could handle that.

Following the voices, she came to an open door. It was certainly the way she had to go to catch up to the gang, but what she saw didn’t bode well for her nose. It looked as though this had once been a factory, and long plastic sheets filled the space just inside the door. Perhaps they had once acted as dust-guards, protecting the rest of the building from machine by-products, but all they had done to dust in recent years was gather it. There was no way she was getting through that without stirring up a cloud. But it had to be done.

Sneezegirl took a deep breath through her mouth, and began to make her way through, as quietly as she could. The dust swirled around her, making her eyes itch and her nose burn. It was all she could do to quash the reflex to sniff, knowing that that would just make everything worse.

The voices were clearer now. Sneezegirl moved close to a large piece of machinery and listened. She would have to take a breath soon, she knew, but… She lifted a corner of her cape and tried to wipe the worst of the dust away from her prickling nose.

“Good job today, lads.” Came a voice she didn’t recognise. “The Big Man will be pleased.”

So, the robbers had a bigger boss? That was interesting. Sneezegirl’s lungs were bursting. She took a fresh breath of air. Well, not so fresh. Dust-filled would be a more accurate adjective. Sneezegirl pressed a finger to her nose as, despite her best efforts of will, her breath began to hitch.

“hh! hhh…”

“Thanks, Tam.” That was one of the robbers she had followed from the bank. “I hope that means he’ll be good to his word.”

“ah…ah… ahhh…” Sneezegirl crushed her finger viciously against her septum, and prayed. Miraculously enough, the urge seemed to recede. Her nose still tickled, though. That sneeze wouldn’t be delayed for long.

“Oh yes.” said the first voice. “You’ll have your cut. Let’s have it on the table, share it out here and now.”

That seemed as good a cue as any. Sneezegirl stepped around the corner.
11212112111.title: SneezeGirl sneaks up on the robbers

The locker room was closer than any of the other doors outside, so Jane decided to head there. By the time she arrived, she could barely hold back her sneeze any longer. She was struggling to keep her eyes open, and her breath was stuttering every few seconds. Worse, even more sticky snot was building up in her nostrils, and it was only seconds away from dripping. Luckily, when Jane charged into the girls' locker room, she saw it was empty and she could sneeze on her own. However, before she could prepare anything to hide her outburst, she had no choice but to let loose.

"Ahh... Ahhhh... Ahhhhhh... AHH-CHHOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!"

Jane felt an immense sensation of relief wash over her as the sticky snot blasted out of her nose. It felt good to finally let it out, and if she was lucky, this meant she wouldn't have to sneeze again for a little while. "Oh..." Blushing bright red and looking around, Jane couldn't decide what to do. First she had to take care of this streamer connecting her to the locker... sometimes they didn't break off. Grabbing a sports bra from inside the locker- 'Might as well, it's not gonna get messier' -Jane wiped her nose, and threw the sodden thing back inside. Biting her lip, she just gingerly shut the locker and spun around, walking nonchalantly out of the locker room.

"I'm sure that won't come back to bite me... yeah... they'll think it was a prank or something."

Slipping quietly back into her classroom with eyes downcast, Jane was walking to an open desk when the teacher addressed her.

"Feeling better?" He said, stopping his lecture on reflex.

"Um, y-yes sir." She gave her nose a rub, and sat down.

"Do try to be more swift next time. Anyway, as I was saying, who knows why your leg moves when the doctor taps it with a mallet during a physical?"

Nobody moved.

"Anyone at all?"

Nope.

"*Sighing...* Very well. Reflexes are automatic, programmed responses in the body. If a certain nerve is stimulated, without conscious thought, a signal is sent to the brain to perform a set of instructions, if you want to think of it like that. I won't go too in-depth, because that would be getting into neuroscience at a college level, but..."

Blah, blah blah. Jane tuned him out, focusing on her nose instead. Sure, she was used to that tickle always being there, but it sure was annoying... she rubbed it, scratched it, and glared at it as best she could.

"The sneeze is a reflex you may be more familiar with..."

Hearing the word, 'sneeze', Jane couldn't help but pay attention once again. Especially the way he was talking, it made her... itchy.

It was a woman in her early 30s with brown hair up in a bun and a big nose. Jane eyed her for a second, but she decided not to respond until the reporter actually asked her a question.

"Can you tell us anything about your powers?" the reporter asked, causing Jane to roll her eyes.

"I'm pretty sure I've used all of them on camera before," she said, rubbing her nose. The reporter jogged a little to keep up with her and asked another question.

She really didn't want to admit that she sometimes couldn't control her powers, especially not to a reporter.

"But we had a half-day, remember?" Jane replied while she looked at the girl's ornate blouse. To top it off, she had a real poppy pinned to the left side of her head. Just looking at her was enough to make her nose itch. "W-w-what's your name?"

The girl giggled in response to the former reply. "Ah, Mr. Nasseau had one of his crazy stories about the Civil War..." She didn't want to answer the other question right away. The girl's voice turned into a SUDDEN, ominous hiss, "I know your secret, Jane. I saw your costume, sneezes, and all of that. Don't spill the beans, or else..." She took the poppy out of her hair, and waved it around Jane's nose. "or I'll show you that secret...!"

Jane saw the name flash on her school ID, "OLWYN LORRAINE". She remembered hearing about that woman in one of the Welsh legends. Never mind; she had to deal with her.

The woman told her, "I'm Olwyn of the Poppy Fields. If you shall live, I shall conduct a spell--All but a little one..." Olwyn took off her bookbag, which smelled of freshly-cut grass and roses. She unzipped the first portion to grab her magical book. Being left-handed, Olwyn managed to grab her bag and book with it, and the poppy in the free hand. "Now, my dear, look as you please..."

Jane's nose was itching like crazy, and she knew well that a sneeze was on the way. "Ah... Hah... Ah!"
112121121122121222121122.title: The girl knows Jane's secret identity.

choices: Treinta
Tiffany
1121211211221212222.content:
"Ha...Yishoo!" She sneezed onto the crook of her arm at Jane. The green-haired teacher blushed out of embarrassment. She felt so bad about her sneeze, she was too mortified to say anything else. She just passed the books down with her free hand. "Turn the pages to... 342. Stat..." She quickly blew her nose and got some Germ-X on her hands just in time to sit down.

Tiffany and Jane looked at Trienta, who pretended to be writing notes when she began doodling a makeshift KAITO in her notebook.

Finally, the teacher told them. "I need to take my medicine in a private area; you can talk among yourselves until I get back!"

Great timing; Jane wished to talk to...
1121211211221212222.title: sneezing towards Jane

choices: On the roof of an abandoned building
In the middle of the street downtown
Somewhere else...
1122.content:
"AHHH...AHHHH..." Jane quickly shoved her index finger under her nose, trying to hold back the sneeze. She could tell it was going to be a big one, so she ran for the front door of the school again. If she let it out outside, she wouldn't do any damage and hopefully everything would be alright. Jane rubbed her nose furiously with her finger as she ran, trying to buy herself more time. Luckily, she managed to hold the sneeze back just long enough to get outside.

"AHH-CHOOOOOOOO!" Jane let out a huge sneeze, just huge enough to activate her powers. The power in question was her Super Sneeze, which sent her flying into the air, headed toward some unknown destination. After flying for a moment, Jane started to descend toward the ground, and she landed...
1122.title: It's a supersneeze that she holds off until...

choices: Jane is able to use a controlled supersneeze to return
Jane has to sneeze for reasons not under her control
11221.content:
...on the roof of an old apartment block several streets away. Jane tried to control her landing, but the uncontrolled nature of the sneeze itself made it harder than usual, and she wound up skidding across the roof for a few paces on her backside. Thank goodness she was wearing trousers, she thought as she scrubbed at her tingling nose.
As she stood, though, she noticed that the back of her trousers was coated in pale dust. Of course, this building was one of a few scheduled for demolition to make way for a new leisure centre. Its neighbour had already been largely reduced to rubble, which would account for all the dust. It also meant that her flight didn't seem to have attracted any undue attention, which was a relief. She might stand a chance of getting back to class unobtrusively once she had cleaned herself off a bit...
11221.title: On the roof of an abandoned building

choices: Jane luckily flies back to school
Jane lands in a tree in the park
112212.content:
Jane began brushing herself off before she quite realized what she was doing. A little bit of dirt and dust filled the air around her as she patted off her clothes. Normally such a small amount of dust wouldn't bother her too much, but fresh off a previous sneeze, she suddenly felt another one coming on.

"Oh... Oh no..." Jane breathed, pressing her index finger to the underside of her nose. Her breath heaved, and she could tell this was going to be another super sneeze. She had been letting a lot of them out today, and she was beginning to worry if something was wrong with her powers.

"Aaaahhhh... Aaaaahhhhhhhh..."

Jane did her best to hold back her sneeze. She had to get off this building, but it would be safer to do so once she was back in control of her sneezes. However, the dust she had inhaled simply wouldn't stop, and just a few seconds later...

"AAAHHHHH-CHHHHOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!"

Jane flew into the air, once again not sure where she was headed.
112212.title: Jane has to sneeze for reasons not under her co...

choices: Jane tries to reach the ground
Jane tries to hold on to her branch
1122122.content:
Branches slapped against Jane's face as she hurtled into the tree. She grabbed at some of them, trying to slow her flight, and eventually wound up hugging a thick branch not far from the trunk- luckily lying on top of it and not hanging off. Looking up, Jane saw that she had managed to hit a large enough tree that its thick leaf-cover completely shrouded her from the outside world. She wasn't too far from the ground, either- if she was careful, she could probably climb down far enough to jump down safely. But- "Oh n-no-"- it was in bloom.
Crashing through as she did, Jane had covered herself in pollen. She could feel it coating her, although that might have been partly her imagination. But there was no exaggerating her nose's reaction. Today was just not being her day!
"ah...AH... nononaH...hih....AH..."
1122122.title: Jane lands in a tree in the park

choices: Jane climbs down
She sneezes herself back out of the tree
11221222.content:
"Ahh... Aahhhh... AH-CHOOOOO!!! W-whoa!"

Jane slipped as she sneezed, and afterward she was just barely hanging from the branch. Her legs hung down beneath her, but she couldn't quite reach another stable branch to let herself down. She tried to pull herself back up, but she was hanging at such an awkward angle that she just couldn't do it.

"Darn it!" Jane grumbled, wishing she had super strength as well as super sneezes right about now. After a few seconds, she lost her grip and fell. Luckily she managed to grab onto another branch, but the impact still hurt a little. Jane laid on top of the branch, hugging it tightly to keep from falling off, and she thought about what to do.
11221222.title: Jane tries to hold on to her branch

choices: Jane sneezes again while still in the air
Jane lands outside the park
112212222.content:
A moment later, Jane's body made the decision for her. A disobedient lock of hair, still full of tree pollen, had become dislodged from her usual ponytail and now fell across her face, even sending a few strands right into her nose. Just moving her arm made her wobble alarmingly, so she tried to huff and blow the hair away, resorting to pressing her nose against the branch as it began to fill with an ominous prickling.
"heeeh..." she gasped, unable to stop her breath hitching, but still holding out a faint hope of getting away with this one. Moving her face against the branch, she pushed the hair away, but one stubborn strand remained, her efforts just causing it to twist and scratch at the sensitive inner edge of her nostril. She felt her nostrils flaring against her will, her lungs demanding great hitching gulps of air.
"heh-HEH...hunh... AH... Ahhh..."
Her eyes slid closed and she rubbed her nose against her shoulder in desperation. This finally dislodged the errant hair, and for a brief moment she thought that she was winning. But the damage had been done.
"Wuhhh... Aaahhh... Ahh... Ahhhh..."
Jane was helpless to do anything but loosen her grip on the branch, just in time to avoid taking it with her as:
"ATISCHHOOOOO!"
She was propelled back out through the slapping branches, emerging in a burst of broken twigs and swirling pollen.
112212222.title: She sneezes herself back out of the tree

choices: Jane lands in a lake
Jane flies through an open bedroom window
11222.content:
downtown, on a busy shopping street. Just about managing to keep her footing, Jane instinctively covered her face with her hands. Her arrival was causing quite the commotion, and she could only hope that she could get off another Super Sneeze before anyone could get a good enough look to identify her. Fortunately, her still-irritated nose was only too willing to oblige. She sucked in a huge, tickling breath, and;
"AH...AHHHHHHHHHH... AHCHOOOOOOO!"
She shot back into the air, feeling someone's hand try and fail to grab her as she rose. She had successfully escaped the crowd, but there had been no chance to fine-tune her sneeze, and she had no idea where she had aimed herself.
11222.title: In the middle of the street downtown

choices: It's a college girl having an allergy attack
It's a businesswoman with a cold
112222.content:
Soaring through the air to who knows where, Jane quickly opened her eyes once to see where she was going. She yelped when she saw herself headed straight for a building, but luckily she flew in an open window. Jane's super sneezes somehow rarely ended in her crashing into things, a fact she was very grateful for. After sailing in the window, Jane landed on a large bed. She bounced once before coming to a stop, and then she laid on her back to catch her breath.

"Whew... That was close," Jane breathed to herself, relaxing on the bed. She tried her best not to disturb the covers, but the bed was just so comfortable. However, just as Jane was finally starting to relax...

"HA-CHOO!"

Somebody sneezed on the other side of the bedroom door. The sound was close, and Jane panicked, not wanting to be caught. She quickly rolled off the edge of the bed and then underneath it to hide just as the door opened. Someone stepped through the door, but Jane couldn't tell who it was, not that she would have known them anyway. Crawling toward the edge of the bed, Jane tried to get a look at the other person in the room.
112222.title: Jane flies through an open bedroom window

choices: Dust under the bed irritates Jane's nose
The woman decides to take a nap
1122222.content:
A pair of expensive-looking slippers shuffled into view, accompanied by the sound of someone vigorously blowing their nose. The slippers paused by the bed, and Jane winced as she heard the soft noise of cover-straightening. She hoped she hadn't left too obvious an imprint.
The phone beside the bed started to ring, and the slippers' owner sat on the bed to answer it. A small bit of fluff drifted onto Jane's cheek as the mattress shifted. She brushed it away. Above her, a woman's voice spoke.
"Oh, Clara, hi. Yeah, I'm disgusting today, so I'm keeping my contagion to myself. No, no, I don't think there's any reason to wait on the report. All the groundwork's done, so you just need to orgadise... or-gan-ise it all into somethig- ugh" She seemed to accept the inevitable invasion of her speech by her growing congestion, ploughing on regardless. "thad they ca- cad read withougt gedding confused. Yeah. Yeah, subthig like thad. Yeah. If you ged stug, call me, bud... mm. mm-hmm. Alrighd. Bye."
The quiet click of the phone returning to its cradle was followed by a pair of sneezes that the woman had clearly been holding off until she could finish the call. By the rattle that accompanied the first one, Jane guessed that she hadn't even had time to fully release the phone before
"hhhh...CHOO! HATCHOO! *sniff*"
The woman yanked some tissues from the box Jane had noticed on the bedside table and blew her nose again, quite productively, by the sound of things. When she got up, Jane hoped she might leave, but she just moved the wastebin closer to her bed and sat back down. A slightly more hurried snatch of tissues preceded another, wetter-sounding sneeze.
"AH! AHTISHOO! ugh."
1122222.title: It's a businesswoman with a cold

choices: Jane sneaks out of the apartment
Jane sneezes and wakes the woman up
11222222.content:
"Ugh, I deed a rest," the congested woman moaned to herself. She whipped out a few more tissues and gave her nose another wet blow. Jane gave a little sympathetic smile. She was no stranger to such problems, though as Sneeze Girl, her colds were much, much messier than this. Jane swiped another dust bunny away from her face, and then she finally realized what the woman meant when she said she needed a rest. The feet beside Jane slid out of the slippers, and then the woman laid down on her bed, letting out a relaxed sigh.

"I have to go to work toborrow," the woman groaned, wiping her stuffy nose with her tissues. "Cold or doe cold, I can't stay at hobe adybore." She gave her nose another wet blow, dropped her tissues into the trashcan next to the bed, and then she did her best to fall asleep.

Huh-Huhh... HATCHHOOOO!"

After sneezing once more, the woman irritably dropped her head onto her pillow and took a deep, stuffy breath. She coughed once, and after just a few minutes, she started to snore softly.
11222222.title: The woman decides to take a nap

choices: The street
The roof
112222221.content:
When Jane was fairly sure it was safe to move, she squirmed out from under the bed and stood up. The woman was facing her, still snoring, one hand half-grasping a crumpled tissue. Casting a last sympathetic glance in her direction, Jane crept softly to the bedroom door. Opening and closing it achingly slowly to avoid making any more noise than necessary, she entered the hall- which, thank goodness, was laid with thick carpet that muffled her footsteps. She moved quickly to the front door and slipped out, not feeling the need to take as much care closing this one, as once she moved away from it there was no evidence that she had trespassed- how could she have? This was the third floor!
The lift was out of order, so Jane made her way to the central stairway. Now she had another choice- should she go down to the street and try to find her way back on foot, or head to the roof, get her bearings, and try to make a more controlled flight this time?
112222221.title: Jane sneaks out of the apartment

choices: Jane flies through a window in the next building over
Jane ends up somewhere outside the city
1122222212.content:
Jane was paranoid she'd run into somebody just as she was heading out the door, so she decided to head up to the roof. She made her way up the dusty staircase, her nose starting to get tickly as she reached the next floor up. Wrinkling her nose, Jane rubbed a finger under her nostrils and sniffed. The dust was annoying, but breathing it in would help her get off a super sneeze once she got up to the roof. As she opened the door at the top of the stairs, Jane's breath was already shuddering. Unfortunately, she realized she probably wouldn't have enough time to aim before...

"Aahhh... Aaaahhhhh... AAHHHHHH-CHHHHHHOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!"
1122222212.title: The roof

choices: The cat appears on cue
The cat is nowhere to be seen...
11222222121.content:
Jenny shot sideways. rather than up as she would have preferred, especially as the building next door was considerably taller! Her luck seemed to be holding, though, as she managed to find another open window rather than an inhospitable wall.
She revised that assessment moments later as she collided with a coffee table in someone's living room. A vase wobbled then crashed onto its side, sending water flying onto the carpet. It sounded heavier than it looked.
Immediately, a man's voice called out;
"Henry? What are you doing in there?" and to Jane's horror, it was followed by the sound of footsteps just outside the door. In a panic, Jane dived behind a curtain just as the handle turned, thanking her lucky stars that they were floor-length.
Through the cloth she watched the man's silhouette enter the room, stopping just inside the room as he caught sight of the mess.
"Oh, for the love of- where are you, you stupid cat?"
11222222121.title: Jane flies through a window in the next buildin...

choices: Jane sneezes
The man leaves the room, allowing Jane to escape
112222221212.content:
"Henry?" the man called out again, picking up the vase. He set it back on the table and headed for the far side of the room. Jane held in a sigh of relief as it looked like the man was about to leave, possibly giving her a chance to escape. Unfortunately, he simply peered through the door before returning to the living room to continue cleaning up.

Jane held her breath, paranoid something would go horribly wrong if she even breathed. Chances are she was right, after all she was Sneeze Girl... She watched the silhouette of the man clean up for a few minutes, and then she absent-mindedly sniffed. It was a quiet sniff, but the man seemed to perk up at the sound of it. Jane held her breath again, hoping the man hadn't actually heard her, but she couldn't be sure yet. Even worse, she felt her nose starting to tickle a little...
112222221212.title: The cat is nowhere to be seen...

choices: It's a Super Sneeze, giving her enough cover to escape.
It's just loud- she's discovered!
1122222212121.content:
"Henry? Henry, I know you're in here."
The man had been kneeling by the table, clearing up the water, but now he stood up, looking around for the cat he thought he had heard. Unfortunately for Jane, he seemed determined to find it this time, as he abandoned the clean-up in favour of sneaking up on the sofa. He poked his head behind it with a quick "a-ha!" but found no cat.
"I'll find you eventually, kitty." he purred, beginning to stalk about the room.
Jane could feel her mask in her pocket, and wished that she had put it on before heading to the roof. Leaning as far back against the wall as she could, she slowly brought it up towards her face, knowing that it was only a matter of time before the curtains occurred to the man as a possible hiding place for 'Henry'. Fortunately, the apartment had a small balcony, and the open window gave him another idea first.
"Are you hiding out there, kitty?" He stepped out of the window to take a look, almost brushing against Jane's hiding place as he did so. She took advantage of the moment to push her mask firmly onto her face, feeling the strong adhesive backing bind to her skin. The slight tug at her nose this created was always irritating, but Jane might have got rid of it with a quick nose-wriggle, had the man not chosen that moment to re-enter the apartment. This time, he did brush against her curtain, sending it rippling across her face in brisk tickly brushes of fabric. Before she even had time to realise what had happened, Jane's nose reacted the only way it knew how.
"hh-ACHHOOOO!"
1122222212121.title: Jane sneezes

choices: Another robbery
A super villain
11222222121211.content:
It was a relatively weak super sneeze, but a super sneeze none the less. The curtain billowed for a second before finally being torn free from its mounts. The curtain flew through the air, wrapping themselves around the man and knocking him to the ground. As he struggled to free himself and stand up, Jane hurriedly approached the window and stepped up onto the ledge.

"Sorry!" Jane said quietly, not sure if she wanted the man to hear her or not. Then, she took a deep breath through her nose and prepared to sneeze herself back out the window.

"Ahhh... Aaahhhhh... AAAHHHHH...! AAHHHH-CHHOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!"

With a proper super sneeze, Jane flew out the window and soared through the air for a moment. She landed on the roof of another building as far away as she could get. This time, rather than immediately flying off again, Jane simply laid on her back and took a rest.

"Whew... That was... Was... Wah-Wahhh-WAACHOOOO!!!"

Jane sat up with the distinctive rush of a danger sneeze. Just as she was getting tired, naturally something bad had to happen. Hopefully it wasn't anything too dangerous, but Jane was prepared to face whatever the world had to throw at her.
11222222121211.title: It's a Super Sneeze, giving her enough cove...

choices: She risks using her Super Inhale to clear the gas
She decides to get closer and engage the robbers directly
112222221212111.content:
Jane was in her costume in a jiffy, bundling up her school clothes and leaving them against an air vent, to pick up later. Now she needed to find the source of her danger sneeze. The itch in her nose gave her an idea of the general direction, but she needed more.

Aiming very carefully, she sneezed down at the roof “ah…CHOO!” and propelled herself straight up in the air, praying for low wind speeds. From this height, it was obvious what had alerted her super-senses. People were pouring out of a building a few blocks away in panic, stumbling and running into each other as they went. Landing back on the rooftop, Jane re-aimed and “ah…AH… ACHOOOOOO!”

Sneeze Girl landed atop a van in the street facing the scene. She recognised the building as the City’s largest jewellery store- hardly surprising that it had been somebody’s target. A strange, brownish fog filled the widows, and she couldn’t tell anything of what was going on inside.
But by far the most disturbing sight here was the crowd who had fled the building. Jane now knew why they had been running so clumsily- almost all of them were being racked with fits of sneezing! All over the square in front of her were people with their faces buried in tissues and handkerchiefs, trying to appease their unhappy noses. A desk clerk was curled up on the ground, whole body shaking with each new eruption.

A police car was at the scene, but one of its occupants was bent over the bonnet, gripped by violent paroxysms of helpless sneezing. His partner seemed to be calling for backup.

Sneeze Girl dropped down next to one of the women who had fled the building and was now hovering some little distance away. She was a sneezy mess, eyes streaming and irregular spasms convulsing her gently curved nose. But, sympathetic as Jane might feel, Sneeze Girl needed to find out what was going on.

“What happened?”

“Ruh-rob-atishew! Ah…ah… tishoo!” The woman held up a trembling finger, before taking the bridge of her nose between thumb and forefinger of her other hand and pinching hard. Amazingly, this seemed to stop her nose in its tracks. I should take lessons from this woman, Jane thought.

“Three of them.” the woman gasped. Her hand hovered above her nose, ready to resume pinching if necessary. It probably would be. Her nostrils were flaring in a way that reminded Sneeze Girl of impatient horses, twitching to be off. She spoke quickly, her voice increasingly distorted by the interference of her nose.

“Wore masks. Can of- heh… s-some sort of ga-ahhh…” the fingers clamped back onto her rebellious nose and squeezed hard. It really did look as though she was restraining an animal now, bucking and squirming beneath her grip, but not yet able to overcome it.

“gas. Everyone-” and the woman gestured to her current predicament.

Clearly feeling that she had got her message across, she pulled a packet of tissues out of her pocket with her off hand, then released her nose. It was like breaching a dam. The sneeze that she had been holding off tore out of her, drawing its siblings behind it in a ceasless cascade
“AHTISHEWW! TISHew! shoo! AHtishew! Hh…hhh…hhTISHew! Atishoo! Ahh….ahhh….ahhhh…tish!tssh!tishhew!

Jane shook her head. This situation looked like it could go very bad very fast. But she had to do something.
112222221212111.title: Another robbery

choices: She uses Snot Storm and catches the robbers
She accidentally uses a Super Sneeze and goes flying off somewhere far away
1122222212121111.content:
Stepping forward into the cloud of gas, Jane knew there was only one thing she could do. Even though being forced to sneeze against her will was probably her greatest weakness, she was also likely the only person who could handle inhaling so much of the gas at once. Sneeze Girl took a few slow breaths to cal herself, and then she went for the big one. Puffing out her chest, Sneeze Girl breathed in as deeply as she could, activating her Super Inhale ability. The gas flooded into her nostrils, and after just a few seconds, she had inhaled all of it.

With the gas cleared, Sneeze Girl could easily see the robbers trying to escape down an alleyway. She tried to chase them, but she could barely take three steps before all the gas she had inhaled started to take its toll. Her nose started to tickle like crazy, and she knew she only had a few seconds to aim and concentrate on the right power.

"Aaahhhhh... Aaaahhhhhhh... Ah-Ah-Ahh! Ah-Ahh-Ahhh-Ahhhhh! HAAAHHHHH!!!"

Jane's breath was hitching out of control, but luckily she managed to aim herself down the alleyway after the robbers. She tried to concentrate on activating Snot Storm, hoping to catch her targets in a mess of sticky snot, but with a sneeze this big and out of control, she just couldn't be sure what would happen. Taking in one last desperate gasp, Sneeze Girl threw back her head...

"AAAHHHHHHHHHHH-CHHHHHHOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!& #34;
1122222212121111.title: She risks using her Super Inhale to clear the gas

choices: Give them a speech.
Sneeze again.
11222222121211111.content:
With that massive sneeze, fueled by the tickly gas and the extra air she had inhaled with her powers, Jane let out a gigantic Snot Storm, one of the biggest she could remember. It coated the alleyway, forming a sticky web across the other end, ropes of the stuff sticking all the criminals together and more dangling from her nostrils.

She had simply sneezed everywhere. Some had even gotten on her costume, the dumpsters and garbage in the alley was stuck in the mass, and those robbers just couldn't move at all.

"Oh... th-that felt good..." Jane gasped, a little out of breath. Her nose still itched, even after all that... the gas was quite potent. Still, she was glad to have sneezed out as much as she did. Approaching the robbers, she pulled the strands still on her face off, and got ready to...
11222222121211111.title: She uses Snot Storm and catches the robbers

choices: No, she'll drop by the station later
Yes, she'll wait
112222221212111111.content:
“Really, boys.”
“Hey!” one of the robbers objected, and Jane realised that this one was actually a woman, long auburn hair spilling out where the blast had knocked her mask loose.
“Well… whatever. Guys like you disgust me, whatever your gender! And frankly-” she gave an evil little smile- “I hope I’ve disgusted you enough to make you think twice next time. You’re not getting out of there in a hurry, so you should have plenty of time to let the message really… soak in.”
Smirking, she turned her head to see the policeman who had been on his radio picking his way carefully towards her. He didn’t seem too annoyed, so she decided to stick around and hear what he had to say. Credit where credit was due, he took the time to formally arrest each of the robbers, despite the sticky snot everywhere, before turning to her.
“Nice job, Sneeze Girl! Thanks for the help.”
“No problem, officer.” Jane replied. “Sorry about the mess. I didn’t have much time to fine-tune it.”
“I’m sure the powers that be will understand.” The cop smiled. “After all, the cost of clean-up is going to pale in comparison to the cost of a retrieval operation, let alone the value of the jewels these guys might have got away with without your intervention.”
Sneeze Girl was starting to like this guy.
“Is your partner okay?” she asked, remembering the stricken policeman from earlier.
“He’s still having trouble with the effects of that gas, but I expect he’ll be fine once he gets it out of his system, whatever the heck it was.”
Speaking of which… The relief her giant sneeze had bought her was definitely wearing off. Sneeze Girl tried to rub her nose as subtly as possible. That stuff certainly was persistent.
“I will need a statement from you, though.” The policeman added. “Can you wait until the rest of my guys arrive for that?”
112222221212111111.title: Give them a speech.

choices: They keep her waiting.
They come to ask the questions.
1122222212121111112.content:
"Uh... yeah, I can hang around for a little while, sure." She rubbed at her nose again and sniffled very softly. Waiting could become an issue, but...

"Yeah, I can hold it off." She muttered.

"Sorry, what was that?" The officer heard her and spoke up. She waved him off, saying it was nothing, she was only talking to herself.

The criminals continued to frown and mope, occasionally yelling something like 'This is NASTY!' while Jane's nose continued to wind itself up again... she sniffled more forcefully now, and was pressing a finger to her nose.
1122222212121111112.title: Yes, she'll wait

choices: She gets out and immediately has to sneeze
She leaves the car and is interrupted by something else
11222222121211111122.content:
Backup arrived fairly quickly, accompanied by a couple of ambulances and some guys in hazmat suits with very serious expressions. As they spread out across the crime scene, the officer Jane had first spoken to approached her again, having been relieved of his charges by two police officers and three hazmat guys, who went to work extracting the robbers from the sticky goo covering them.
“I really just need a statement.” He explained, leading her to one of the cars, where a policewoman and a man in plain clothes were waiting. “If you give it to us verbally, Harry there can jot it down for us, and we’ll record it in the car so that we have a double record. I’m Sergeant Wilson, by the way, in case you feel the need to mention it. That sound alright to you?”
Sneeze Girl nodded, and slid into the back seat of the car. ‘Harry’ sat in the front, setting himself up with a sheaf of forms and a biro, while the policewoman sat next to her.
“In your own time, then, Sneeze Girl.” She said.
Sneeze Girl briefly explained what the situation had been when she arrived, stopping every now and then to sniff and scrub at her nose. “I knew that the gas was the main problem, so I sucked it clear of the building. This let me see that the robbers were attempting to escape, so I sneezed out all that snot to stop them. I didn’t think I had time to wait for anyone else to react. That was when, officer, um… Wilson came over. Do I need to go further than that?”
“No, that should be fine. Just give Harry’s transcript a glance and sign it to say it matches your statement.”
Sneeze Girl took the papers they handed her. Reading was difficult, though, because at that moment the itch that she had been so steadfastly ignoring demanded her attention again. Jane listened to the woman’s ragged breathing above her. She would give it a couple of minutes, she decided, wait for the woman to be deeply asleep, then creep out and make her escape. Only…

She squirmed out from under the bed and onto the rug beside it, where she paused to scrub at the offending nostril with a dust-rimed hand. For a few moments, she thought she had achieved relief, but when she took another breath in through her nose, she found she couldn’t have been more wrong. She was going to sneeze!

“heh…” Desperately, Jane looked around for somewhere to hide. The window was closed, but… Jane made for the bedroom door, a finger wedged beneath her nose to try and buy herself a few precious seconds.

She had held off allergy attacks for a couple of hours before, but it was never a sure thing, and she had never managed for anything like that when she was forced to stay near the source of the irritation.

She panted beneath the all-consuming irritation that had blossomed in her nose, that was scratching violently against the walls of her control, and she knew that a truly epic Super Sneeze, probably one bigger than any she'd released before, was on its way. She was practically running, now, rounding the corner to the girls' bathroom, only to find...
113132.title: Jane heads to the bathroom

choices: Jane heads to her next class.
Jane decides to see the nurse.
1131321.content:
Empty! Good! At last, some relief... She let the sneeze take over, unable to hold back any longer, the last breath she had taken burning in her lungs-

"HIIIIIIIHHHHHHHHHTTTTTTTSCHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH HHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH-HOOOOOO!

Relief flooded through her as she let loose, sneezing out a massive gust of wind that slammed all of the stall doors open and spun the toilet paper 'round and 'round until they were all spent in huge piles on the floor. The mirror was coated with a layer of drippy spray, like from a squirt bottle, and the tile floor was slick with moisture. Jane ended up bent double, hands on her knees, panting and grinning- it had felt so good, and the itch was finally gone... but now she had to get out of here, quick!

Jane exited the bathroom, walking casually away- running arouses suspicion, after all! But was it safe to go back to class? This seemed like a bad nose day...
1131321.title: It was empty... time to sneeze!

choices: The nurse already knows about Jane's powers
Jane has to keep her powers secret

Perhaps going to the nurse was the best course of action. If nothing else, Jane figured she could get a note excusing her from class even if the nurse couldn't help her. She rubbed her nose as she walked down the hall, hoping to get to the nurse's office quickly. Still, not so quickly that she'd arouse suspicion. Jane held her nose as she passed by an open window. After that huge sneeze in the bathroom, her nose was still relieved and free of tickling, but she didn't want to take any risks.

Eventually, Jane finally arrived at the nurse's office. She paused just outside, taking a deep breath to keep herself calm. Then, she put a hand on the door handle and pulled it open...

Jane just joins the others in the hallway

Though Jane tries as hard as she can to hold back her sneeze she knows it's a loosing battle. The sneeze was playing and teasing is the back of her nose and would explode at any second. All Jane could do was pray for the best.

Suddenly there comes a loud explosion from the hallway. Everyone gets up and runs to the door to see what's happening.

Jane takes knows opportunity when she sees it and rushes to the window to sneeze out it.

"AAAAAH, AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH-CHOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!" Jane sneezes a big and gross snot sneeze that gets all over the outside lawn, but luckily for her everyone's too occupied with the explosion to notice.

Speaking of explosions, as a superheroine, Jane feels she should look in to this.

11322.content:
Wanting to know what was going on as soon as possible, Jane hurried to the hallway- and regretted it almost immediately. It looked as though a bomb had gone off- she could dimly see that the main doors had been smashed. She couldn’t see very well, though, because- and here was the problem-whatever caused the explosion had sent up a tremendous cloud of dust.

Her nostrils, already made sensitive by her pollen allergies, reacted immediately. The tickle it caused was so intense that tears sprang to Jane’s eyes.

“hh…hh!” she gasped, and clapped her hands to her nose. Beneath her fingers she could feel her nostrils flaring and squirming, desperate to do what they did best. This was awful. True, everyone’s view was obscured by the dust for now, but she wasn’t in costume, and she had no way of knowing what or who she might damage if she succumbed to this urge here and now.

“ah…ahhh….ahhhhhHHH….”

choices: Jane checks everything out
Jane changes to Sneezegirl

Jane knows that there's no way to fight it so all she can do is let it loose, "AAAAAAAAH, AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH'CHHHIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO OOOOOOOOO!"

The power from her sneeze blows all the dust out the open doors.

"Whoa, did you see that?" One of the students said.

"It must be Sneezegirl!" Another said.

Jane was ready to admit everything when the students started looking all over, "Where is she?" Some said.

Jane figured that there must have been so much dust that nobody saw where the sneeze came from. Now that she'd gotten her sneeze out of her system Jane felt better, for now, but there was still the matter of what the explosion was all about. She was tempted to go and find out, but she remembered how sensitive her nose was and how a super sneeze could form at any minute. Jane thought that maybe she should change to Sneezegirl, but would that give who ever caused it time to get away?

In fact, she was ready in less than a minute, but it felt like forever as she stuffed her school clothes into her bag and flung it back under her desk. As SneezeGirl, she ran back out into the hallway.

"What's going on?" She called out to the nearest teacher.

Just then the principal, Mr.Smith, came. "SneezeGirl, I'm so glad you're here. Come to my office, we managed to get a picture of the culprit on our security camera and I think you may recognize who it is."

SneezeGirl went to the office, watched the video play back and saw....

Something else happens

When she arrives she finds that there are such things as miracles as the class is empty. Everyone else must have gone to check on the explosion too.

Jane can't hold it in much longer as her sneeze feels like a run away freight train coming out of her nose. She quickly runs to one of the open windows and lets loose, "AAAAAA, AAAAAAAAAAAH, AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA-CHIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII IIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEWWWWWWWWWWWWWW!& #34;

Jane's sneeze blasted out like a hurricane, but luckily there was only an open field so all that happened was she blew away a little of the turf.

Her sneeze had blown all irritating particles out of her nose and she felt much better until she heard someone's voice shout, "Hey, is that Jane Marigold?"

Jane quickly ducked down from the window terrified that she may have just blew her cover.

She can hear the sound of foot steps coming toward the classroom.
113222.title: Jane ducks back into the classroom.

choices: After her shower, she hears a police siren wailing down the road.
Jane eats breakfast.
Jane goes back to bed.
Jane feels a danger sneeze coming on.
12.content:
Dozing, Jane opened her eyes late in the morning on Saturday. She sniffled and groaned, noticing that she had a headache... and her nose felt funny... *snkkk* ...it was very congested.

"Oh no... thank goodness it's Saturday and I don't have school..." She moaned, realizing that she had caught a cold.

For Jane, this was both a blessing and a curse. While it would strengthen her powers as Sneeze Girl, it would also rob her of her control. Generally when she had a cold, she would load up on medications and keep her costume with her at all times, just in case- but since she didn't have school, she decided she might just let it run it's course until Monday...

Her nose started to tickle as she pulled herself out of bed, prepping for the day. Once she got into the shower, her nose started to itch... badly. She felt her mucus production skyrocket, her powers out of control due to her illness... colds always seemed to root in her nose.

"Ahh.. A-AAHhhH!" She put a finger to her nose, rubbing... but it was no good. "AAAEECHHHHHHHHHHHHHOOOOO!" She sneezed! A huge blast of sticky snot accompanied her Super Sneeze, strings of it sticking all over the inside of the shower. Groaning, she turned on the hot water and started to wash the mess away...
12.title: It's Saturday so she sleeps in.

choices: Jane's mom or sister barges in
One of Jane's friends calls
Jane manages to fall asleep, but she dreams about sneezing anyway
123.content:
The hot water of the shower did make Jane's nose feel better, and it definitely helped unclog her head. However, once she was finished, she felt just as sick as before. Snuffling to herself, Jane dried off and decided there was nothing she could do but go back to bed. She stumbled back into her room and opened the bottom drawer of her dresser. It was filled to the brim with tissue boxes for just such an occasion as this. She didn't keep them out in the open for fear that her parents would find them all and think it was weird, but they were immensely helpful when she was sick.

Plucking three tissues out of the first box, Jane layered them together and blew her nose. It was loud and wet, and she could feel even more sticky snot blow out of her nose and quickly fill the tissues, but better out than in. Groaning to herself, Jane threw the tissues away and flopped down on her bed. It was always difficult for her to fall asleep when she was sick, but it would be better than trying to go out and fight crime with a cold.
123.title: Jane goes back to bed.

choices: the shower
the window
1231.content:
Jane's sister Kim comes running in. Kimberly was only 8 years old, but was a bit of a prankster, always coming up with ways to play pranks on Jane. This time, before Jane could react, she blew a handful of red pepper at Jane.

Jane screamed and jumped to her feet as she tried to blow it away by franticly waving her arms around, but it was no good. Some of the red pepper particles made it's way inside her nose and she could feel it forming a monster sneeze.

Kim didn't know of Jane's SneezeGirl identity, but Jane knew that when she inhaled red pepper it made her do a flaming sneeze, as in enough to burn the house down.

She quickly chased Kimberly out of her room, but she knew there were only seconds before her flaming sneeze burst out. Jane ran quickly to...
1231.title: Jane's mom or sister barges in

Jane goes back to bed
12312.content:
Jane runs to her bedroom window which was open. Not having anytime to direct the sneeze she just let rips, "HAAAAAAAAAAAAA, HAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA, HAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA, HAAAAAAAAAAAAAA-CHOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!"

Her flames set fire to a nearby group of trees and they instantly light up like a small forest fire.

Jane know she has to do something a thinks that one of her super sneezes might blow it out. She reached into a drawer from her nightstand near her bed to where she kept pepper shakers for just such an emergency and inhales it thru her nose quickly. She then has a strange feeling that she never had before, like her nasil passages were freezing up. But she didn't have to think about as she gave out an enormous, "KAAAAAAAAAAAA, KAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA, KEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEER-CHOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO !"

When she lets loose her lungs feel like a cold wind and she watches as her sneeze freezes over the trees putting out the fire and making it look like an isolated blizzard had hit them.

She'd never done that before. Jane then looked at the pepper container and saw it was white pepper. She'd discovered a new sneeze power, a, "Freeze sneeze." Appairently white pepper made her sneeze, like Superman's freeze breath, because...well it was white, she figures.

Jane changes back and goes shopping

Jane grabs the white pepper shaker and heads to the park. Once she's there she hides behind some bushes and changes into her SneezeGirl costume in case anyone should see her.

She goes over to a small lake, takes a small sniff of the white pepper and has the same feeling as before as she gives out an enormous. "WAAAAAAAAAAAAA, WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA, WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA-CHOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO OOOOOOOOOOOOO!"

The lake turns to ice and looks like it's frozen to the bottom.

She then tries it again on a nearby hill, "KAAAAAAAAAAAAAA, KAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA, KAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA-CHIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII IIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO! 34;

It became a snowy slope and Jane slides down it easily. This new, "Freeze Sneeze," might prove useful.

choices: Jane has to sneeze!
Jane sneezed in her sleep.
Jane's mom comes to serve her some lunch.
1233.content:
A field. Glorious. Empty.

She can be herself here. Her stuffy nose gleefully lets out sneeze after sneeze.

"HhhCHHH! Aaa... ah... AEECHHHHHHHHHHHH!" The sneezes echo strangely around the dreamscape, shaking the world. Large blasts of snot coat the ground and the few sparse trees, while gusts of wind from her super sneezes sweep across the plain.

She flies into the air, a string of sneezing propelling her ever-higher, a glimmering trail of mist hanging behind her.

She is weightless, in space. The earth is beautiful. A sneeze rockets her out of the solar system, planets and countless stars flickering past like tiny pricks of light.

"AAAAAAEEEEEEEEESHHHHHHHHHHHHHHOOO!" Her nose is just so itchy, she sneezes again and again. So itchy...

So itchy...

Jane awoke...
1233.title: Jane manages to fall asleep, but she dreams abo...

choices: Jane tries to get to the tissues in time
Jane abandons the tissues and catches the first sneeze in something else
12331.content:
... to an all-consuming itch. Her nose burned. It wasn't painful, but the itch was so great that Jane wasn't sure that pain wouldn't be better. It filled her immediate universe, and she fumbled blindly for tissues, her eyes glued shut by the desperate urge to sneeze.
"Huh...huh.. haaaah-"
To her horror, she felt her hand catch the edge of her tissue box and heard it thump onto the floor beside her bed. With an itch like this, even if it didn't produce super-sneezes to start with, she would have to clear her nose soon, or nothing would stop it building into a super-fit.
12331.title: Jane has to sneeze!

choices: Jane manages to contain the effects of the supersneeze to her room
Jane loses control of the supersneeze
123312.content:
"ah... aH... AH..."
No time to get the tissues. Barely time to snatch up her covers and pull them to her face. She would regret it later, but this sneeze was coming on too fast and too strong for any other course of action.
"AHHHHH.... CHUMPH!" Jane muffled the sneeze against the blankets, feeling herself leave a damp trail behind her as she lifted her head, only to have it snap back down again with the force of two fresh sneezes, both just as irrepressible as the first.
"ACHOO! AH- AHCHUMPH!"
She wrenched her eyes open and scrubbed her nose with what blanket remained that didn't have enough snot on it to make matter worse, but the itch refused to be pacified. Unable to resist it any longer, she gasped in one last, hitching breath, and:
"AAAAHCHOOOO! Ah.. ACHOO! Ah... AH... aTISHooo!" Her blankets now soaking wet, Jane made a valiant effort to slow the next sneeze down, but succeeded only in driving her nose to greater heights.
"AhhhhhhHHHHHHCHOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!" The whole bed jumped with the force of her sneeze, and she gasped for breath, feeling as though that last sneeze had sucked out all the air she had.
Her nose wasn't going to let up, though. The initial, burning itch had become a powerful tingling, as though her nose was still vibrating from the power of her earlier sneezes, but if anything, this sensation made her more desperate to gain relief. However, almost as though her body had decided to torture her, the next sneeze was stuck.
"Ahhh....Ahhh... ehhh..."
Jane was paralysed with the need to let it go, but her nose wouldn't let her, the tingling building almost to the critical point and then receding, again and again, until Jane couldn't bear it any longer. She scrubbed and rubbed and massaged her nose in her desperation, until finally...
"Ahh..ehhh...AH!..."
But as the sneeze built, Jane realised that this sneeze would not be like the others. A supersneeze was coming!
123312.title: Jane abandons the tissues and catches the first...

choices: Jane has to sneeze
Jane just wants to get some rest
12333.content:
Jane furiously rubbed her nose, the itchiness she had felt in her dream carrying over into reality. Luckily she didn't have to sneeze yet, but the itch was driving her crazy. She didn't stop rubbing for at least a minute, at which point she heard knocking on her bedroom door.

"Jane? Honey, are you alright? You're usually wide awake by now."

Penelope, her mother's voice, warm and comforting, but also loud enough to make Jane's head throb. She placed a hand on her forehead and groaned. Rolling over slightly, Jane faced toward her door.

"Mom, I'm sick," she complained, sounding extremely stuffy. As soon as the words left Jane's mouth, her mother opened the door and stepped inside. She was holding a tray with a bowl of soup and some carrots, which could only mean one thing.

"I thought you might be," Jane's mother said, setting the tray down on the bedside table. Penelope looked exactly like Jane, only 25 years older and with glasses. She even wore her hair in a ponytail, just like Jane usually did. Rubbing Jane's shoulder gently, she let out a sigh.

"What's the matter, honey?"

Jane didn't say a word, but she sniffed powerfully, wrinkling her nose. Penelope smiled and gave Jane another rub.

"Got the sniffles?"

Jane nodded. Penelope smiled again, and then she removed her glasses and stared out the window. Shaking her head, Penelope put her glasses back on and looked down at Jane.

"It's a shame you're sick on a beautiful day like today. Is there anything I can do?"
12333.title: Jane's mom comes to serve her some lunch.

choices: It's a super sneeze.
It's a normal sneeze, but still messy.
123331.content:
"Y-yeah..." Jane said shakily, feeling her nose start to act up. "L-leave for a bit? I f-feel... a snee... sneeze coming on. I d-don't want you and dad getting... s-sih... siihhh..." Her nostrils were flaring powerfully, but she couldn't tell if this were going to be a super sneeze, or just a snotty cold sneeze. Either way, she wanted her mom out.

"M-mom... pleh... please... I... c-can't hol... hoohhh... h-hold..." She struggled with each word, her nose teasing her and making her draw in shuddering breaths, the covers rocking slightly up and down with her motions. Little creeping tendrils of irritation slowly coiled around that spot in the back of her nose- the one that when it gets bothered, you can't help but sneeze...
123331.title: Jane has to sneeze

Jane lets out a super-sneeze
1233312.content:
"Aahhh... Haaahhhh... HAAA-CHHHPLFF!!!"

Jane covered her nose with her hand as she sneezed, realizing afterward she should have used a tissue. Her nose had emptied itself of its snot, but it had to go somewhere. Jane's hand was full of everything she sneezed out, and she felt horribly embarrassed. Not wanting her mom to see it, she kept her hand over her nose.

"M-mom, can I have a tissue?" Jane asked, her eyes pleading with her mother to not say anything embarrassing. She didn't even want to ask, but she didn't see any alternative. Penelope smiled warmly and plucked two tissues from the box next to the bed. Moving Jane's hand out of the way, Penelope wiped her daughter's nose and then held the tissues under her nostrils.

"Good, now blow."
