Inside the tissue, Jane's nostrils flared open and shut, widening to round holes and then returning to normal several times as she sat silently, trying to get a breath so she could blow. Her forehead wrinkled, and her eyes rolled up as she struggled to keep them open. She realized that she was going to sneeze again, instead.

"M-mom... I'm... go-ing-to-sne-snee-sneeeeze!" She gasped out between quick breaths

"He-he-he...!" Her chest puffed out a little and her head rocked back, brown eyes squeezing shut as she felt her power swell within her.

"Just let it out, dear, I can just wash my-"

"HEHHHHH-CHHHHHHHHHUUU!" a forceful blast of wind and spray of wetness threw Penelope's hand from her daughter's nose, and caused her to fall off the bed onto the floor, uttering an "Ah!"

Rubbing her nose fiendishly, Jane snuffled and looked down at her mother.
12333122.title: Jane lets out a super-sneeze

choices: Penelope doesn't have her powers anymore
Penelope still has her powers, but she's gotten better at controlling them
123331221.content:
"M-mom, I can explain," Jane said, rubbing her nose as hard as she could. Penelope sat up, straightening her glasses. She looked a little bewildered, but not nearly as shocked as Jane expected her to be. Her mother pushed herself up onto the bed, sat next to Jane, and then gave her a tight hug.

"Mom?" Jane said, feeling confused.

"It's okay, Jane," Penelope said, rubbing her daughter's back. "I know. I've had a feeling for a while, but now I know."

"Know w-what?" Jane asked, raising an eyebrow. Penelope gave her daughter one last squeeze and then held her out at arm's length.

"You have the same powers I did when I was your age," she said, giving Jane a smile. Jane blinked, unable to believe what her mother just said. Did her mother used to be another Sneeze Girl?

"Y-you did?" Jane asked, her confused expression still in place. "How did you know?"

"Well," Penelope began with a smile. "I got a little suspicious when I started seeing news reports about a young girl with the same same powers as me. And then I found all your tissue boxes..."

"Oh, you found those?" Jane asked, sounding embarrassed. Penelope nodded, giving Jane another smile. Then, Jane raised an eyebrow and scratched the back of her head.

"How come you stopped? Being a super hero, I mean."

"Well, I'm not really sure what all the reasons were. I grew up, I guess. Plus, I knew I wasn't the only super hero out there."

"Do you still have your powers?"
123331221.title: The Former Sneeze Girl...

choices: Jane wants to see her mom's old outfit.
Jane wants to know if her Dad knows, too.
1233312212.content:
Hesitating for a bit, Penelope sighed. "Yes, dear... I do. But I haven't used them in a long, long time. You'll learn to control them someday, like I did."

"But I don't understand... they're so powerful, I just can't stop them at all!" Jane sniffled, finally wiping her hands off with some tissue.

"It won't always be like that. It's just another part of growing up. It's a knack..." Smiling gently, she wiped her daughter's nose. "Just don't get yourself hurt playing superhero. I won't try to stop you, because it is your decision. I chose to have a family, and leave the hero work to others, but who knows what you'll want to do?"

She got up off the bed. "Would you like some more soup, dear?"

Snuffling and rubbing her (constantly) itchy nose, Jane nodded. "Before you go..."
1233312212.title: Penelope still has her powers, but she's go...

Jane falls asleep again while she waits.

"Yes, dear?" Penelope asked, smiling down at her daughter. Jane continued rubbing her nose, trying to think of a way to ask her question without seeming too forward.

"Could I... Do you still have your old outfit?"

Penelope actually blushed slightly at Jane's question, and then she smiled and gave a nod. "Yes, I do. I haven't even looked at it in so long though. I could never get rid of it. I keep it up in the attic. I'll bring it down for you after I get you some soup."

Jane nodded, still rubbing her nose. Penelope smiled back, and then she rubbed her own nose, giving Jane a wink as she stepped out of the room. Jane laid back on her bed, smiling up at the ceiling. Somehow it just felt good to know she and her mom had even more in common.
12333122121.title: Jane wants to see her mom's old outfit.

"Now, Jane... I don't want you laughing. Keep in mind, I designed this when I was much younger." She set the tray on Jane's lap and unfolded the outfit, modeling it over her clothes. It was... colorful. And immodest. A cut-out cleavage pocket, streaks of red and gold... garish, even.

"What's the matter, honey?" Penelope asked, gently wiping Jane's nose. Jane sniffled, feeling like she might cry.

"It's just so hard," she said, her voice low. "Every single time I sneeze I could give myself away. I can't control my powers at all. I know you said you figured it out, but I don't think I ever will."

Jane tries to get more sleep
123331221211112.content:
Jane groggily opened her eyes, and when she saw the state of her room she almost screamed. A thick trail of sticky snot was stuck to the ceiling directly above her. Luckily it hadn't hit her ceiling light or the fan, but it was bad enough already. Worst of all, it was still connected to her nostrils. Jane tried to separate the string of snot from her nose, but it was stuck in place. She tried to pull it out of her nose, but it wouldn't budge. Failing that, she tried to sniff it back up her nostrils, but the other end was stuck fast to the ceiling too. Not sure what else to do, Jane called out and hoped no one else was home.

"Mommmmm!!!" Jane whined, hoping her mother would be quick. She heard footsteps coming up the stairs, and then Penelope entered the room once more. She gasped when she saw what had happened, and then she approached the bed to comfort her daughter.

"It's okay, I'll take care of it," Penelope said, grabbing a handful of tissues. First, she gently wiped at Jane's nose until the string of snot finally came free from her nostrils. Jane sniffed and wrinkled her nose, itchy in the wake of being full of snot, but then she took her mother's hand and squeezed it gently in thanks. Penelope gave her a kiss on the forehead, and then she stood up on the bed to reach the ceiling. Penelope grabbed the trail of snot and yanked on it, but it was still stuck firmly in place. Gritting her teeth, she pulled on it again as hard as she could. This time it finally came free, but she'd pulled on it a little too hard. "Did you ever have to deal with that?" Jane asked, rubbing her nose. Penelope nodded, giving a smile.

"I certainly did. Whenever I was sick, I'd have very strange dreams about sneezing. When I woke up, sometimes I'd find I ended up sneezing in my sleep. It was usually a mess..."

"Ahhh... hh-hhh... hiiiiihhhh..." She trembled with the effort, minute shivers and gasps racing through her, her head flicking this way and that, nose wriggling all over the place. A few more times, she almost... allllmost lost control of it...

1233312212111121111.content:
"Oh, well, honey, you see... it will," Penelope said sheepishly. "Sorry, sweetheart. You'll have about an hour before you have to sneeze again."

"What?!" cried Jane. "Then why..."

"It's a handy trick if you want to fight crime," said Penelope. "If you don't want to sneeze while you're not being a superhero, it helps to hold it back. Then, when it come time to fight, your sneezes will be all the more enormous."

"Yeah, you're right," said Jane. "Thanks again, Mom. But the bigger sneezes are harder to hold back."

"Well, that's the thing," said Penelope. "About every twelve hours or so, you'll have to sneeze, with or without someone's finger. I've never made it longer than twelve hours, forty-five minutes. Do you want to hear about it?"

"Sure!" said Jane. She put her hands in her lap, interested.

"I was in college at the time," said Penelope. "Thankfully, I lived alone in an apartment, so I didn't have to worry about my roommate discovering my powers. Anyway, I woke up that morning with an itch in my nose. I tried to induce a sneeze, but it wouldn't come out." Jane grimaced, knowing the feeling.

"I got up and went to all of my classes that day. It was spring, and the pollen was in the air. Pollen usually doesn't bother me, but it wasn't just breathable, it was visible, on the cars, the sidewalks, everything..." Jane's nose twitched in reaction, but the lingering tickle from her previously-held-off sneeze retreated to manageable size.

"So, I got to class, and it seemed like any other day. But the, one of the other students - I didn't know her name - she sneezed. Seeing and hearing that had an effect on me - it got my tickle unstuck, and I had to concentrate on holding it back. By the end of that class, two other students sneezed, but I didn't see them, so it wasn't as bad as the first time."

"But things got worse when I got to my second class that day. Not only were more students sneezing, they were sneezing more frequently. It was torture, seeing them all sneeze to their hearts' content while I had to hold back or risk a crisis."

"Oh, man," said Jane.

"My third class that day was thankfully my last one," continued Penelope. "There wasn't a single sneeze from any of the other students. But then, about five minutes before we all got out, the teacher - she was a tall, blonde lady - she let loose the biggest sneeze I'd ever seen from anybody other than myself. Or you, of course." Jane blushed.

"Still, I held back. The mucus had filled up my nose to the point that I had to breathe through my mouth with my teeth shut. I was hyperventilating by that point. Then, blessedly, class was dismissed. I was first out the door."

"I realized that if I went back to my apartment, my pent-up sneeze would cause some suspicious damage. So instead, I ran from the campus to the local landfill. It was farther away than my apartment, and the jog took two hours, but it was better than the alternative. When I got there, the place had closed up, but I was able to scootch in through a hole under the chain link fence. And then, once I realized I was alone, I braced myself against the fence, and let the tickle have its way. I just went, simply, "KER-CHOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOHHHHHHHHHH!" ;

Jane laughed at her mother's fake sneeze, but the sight of it made her a bit itchier. She tried to ignore it.

"There was nothing on the news about it the next day," said Penelope. "Nothing about the tidal wave of garbage that I created." She smiled. "You know, I wish I'd gotten into the art scene. I could have taken a picture and called it my masterpiece." Jane giggled.

"I'd have loved to see your masterpiece," said Jane. "Uh-oh... the tickle is coming back..."

Jane felt her eyes watering as she saw the flowers. They didn't look like a family at all. She had them sit in a long booth. "My name is Jane, and I will be your server today. I'll come back with your menus!" Before she got to the menus, she
132.title: She notices something fishy with the customers.

choices: Jane sneaks out the back and changes to SneezeGirl
She just does her job like nothing was wrong
1321.content:
Jane's nose began to tickle. After handing out the menus she quickly went to the ladies room where she gave out a triple sneeze, "Ahhhhh, AHHHHHHHH-CHOOOOOOOOO! AAAAAAAAH-CHOOOOOOOO! AAAAAAAAAAAAH-CHOOOOOOOOOOOO!"

Luckily they didn't cause a ruckus or do any damage, but when she sneezed three times she knew that was like Spiderman's spider sense, it meant there was some kind of trouble with those people though she didn't know exactly what it was.

Jane then peeked out the bathroom door and saw the people were now talking very quietly to each other with their hands over the side of their mouths.

Jane knew it didn't take Batman to know that something was up, but what should she do about it?
1321.title: had a warning sneeze

choices: Jane serves him anyway
The Gambler sees through her disguise
Something else.
1322.content:
She sensed something going on. She noticed the ornate looking die on the counter. Apparently, she had to deal with this man, too. Almost immediately, he came in with something new, and something old. He had some rimless glasses, but his hat and cane stayed the same. Jane felt like shovi g him out the door.

"Good afternoon, madam! I was looking for my comrades." That British accent, and those blue eyes were his signature features. She was in limbo, and she only had a few seconds!

She looked at those people by the table; was it a costume party?
1322.title: recognized the Gambler

choices: A gang of drug dealers
An alien spacecraft
Giant ants
something else
15.content:
It's a beautiful Saturday morning and her family deciced to go for a picnic ride in the state park.

They also Jane's cousin Gina. Gina is a pretty girl who's a couple of years younger then Jane, but the most important thing is she also the only one who shares Jane's secret about being SneezeGirl.

Both of the girls have always been good friends and have always been there for one another. Jane knew that she'd need someone to talk to about being SneezeGirl and that Gina would be the perfect person. And she was as she never told anyone, plus hearing about the adventures the Jane had as SneezeGirl was so exciting.

In a half hour they had reached the park. They unloaded everything at a nearby table.

"Boy, I hope that a certain smarter than the average bear dosen't show up." Gina joked.

Everyone chuckled.

Both Jane and Gina decide to go for a walk on the trails before eating.

Once they were far enough away and nobody else was around Gina said, "How 'bout telling me one of your SneezeGirl adventures?"

"Okay," Jane said, "How about the time when I..."

Ten minutes later Jane continued, "and I don't think we'll be seeing them around anytime soon."

Gina laughed, "That was a great one."

Then they spotted an ouyhouse 20 feet away. Jane says she has to use it and asks Gina to wait here.

After Jane left Gina heard some kind of noise in the woods. She followed the direction of the sound and when she saw it she put her hand over her mouth in horror as she saw...
15.title: Something else

choices: Gina runs to get Jane
Gina stays to try to learn more
151.content:
one of Jane's enimies, Dog Master. Gina heard how Jane told her of the times she fought him. Dog Master was a master trainer of dogs. He could train them to do anything which he used to commit all kinds of crimes and he himself was a nasty piece of work.

There Gina saw him with 3 huge german shepherds picking up a shipment of drugs.
151.title: A gang of drug dealers

choices: Jane lets Gina come
Jane goes it alone
1512.content:
Gina, wanting to help Jane as much as she could, listens to see if she can learn anything else.

Just then one of the dogs picks it's ears up and looks toward Gina's direction, it's picked up her scent and runs growling right toward Gina. She quickly runs in the other direction to try to escape, but as she does she trips and falls.

All she could do now is look in horror as the huge dog approached her barring it's teeth, when there came a loud, "HEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEH-CHIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO OOOOOOOOOOOOO!" and a wad of sticky snot wrapped around the dog's legs rendering it helpless.

Gina looked and saw Jane, she had saved her. Jane asked what had happened and Gina told her about Dog Master.

"So he's at it again." Jane said, "He gives all puppy dogs such a bad name."

There's no one else around so she changes into her SneezeGirl costume.

"Let me go with you." Gina says

"No," Jane says, "I don't want you to get hurt."

"Please," Gina says, "I can help."
1512.title: Gina stays to try to learn more

choices: SneezeGirl tries to subdue Gina
SneezeGirl goes after Dog Master
15121.content:
Jane tells Gina to get on her back and to hold on tight. She says that she'll use her super sneeze to propell them over the trees and to the other side of the clearing to take Dog Master by surprise.

"May I have the honor of making you sneeze?" Gina giggles.

"Go for it." Jane says.

Gina took a few strands of Jane's hair, carefully inserted it in Jane's nose and wriggled it around. Jane gave a huge gasp as she went, "HAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA, HAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA-CHAAAAAAAAAAAAAAOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO OOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!"

The two girls went flying over the trees and landed on the other side of the clearing like Jane said. When they landed Jane told Gina to stay put as she approached Dog Master.

"Ok, Dog," she said, "you can heel now cause your drug ring here is over!"

"SneezeGirl?" Dog Master said in surprise, "What are you doing here?"

"I'm on a picnic." She says, "Now give up!"

Dog Master laughs and points toward Gina. SneezeGirl looked in horror to see Dog Master's remaining dogs standing over Gina's body growling and baring they're teeth.

"Surrender or I'll tell them to rip your friend limb from limb." Dog Master demanded.

"Okay, okay!" Sneezegirl said throwing her arms up, "I surrender. Just don't hurt her."

Dog Master calls them off then goes to the wagon where the drugs are and took one out, "These aren't just drugs." He says putting it into a dart gun, "Look what it can do." He fires at Gina's arm.

At first Gina just let out a small cry, but then her body changes into the shape of a human dog. (Similar to what a werewolf looks like.)

"Now she is under my control and so shall be the same fate of every person in town." Dog Master laughs and orders Gina to attack SneezeGirl. He then gets into his his wagon and drives away leaving the two to battle each other.
15121.title: Jane lets Gina come

choices: SneezeGirl check to see if the rest of her family is ok
SneezeGirl tries to locate Dog Master's hideout
151211.content:
Gina slowly approaches SneezeGirl with her teeth barring, holding up her claws on her hairy hands prepairing to attack.

"Gina, don't!" SneezeGirl shouts holding her hands up, "It's me, Jane!"

But it's no use as Gina has lost her rational mind. She leaps at SneezeGirl, but SneezeGirl dodges at the last second. She doesn't want to hurt Gina, but she also doesn't want to get masacred.

Thinking quickly SneezeGirl does a super inhale to inhale some of the dirt into her nose, which causes her to do a super sneeze, "Keeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeer-CHOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO OO!" she blasts Gina against a nearby tree. She then inhales some more dirt and blasts a big wad of snot sticking Gina to the tree, "AAAAAAAT-CHOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!"

Gina growls and struggles, but can't break free.

SneezeGirl knows that will hold Gina for a while, but she'll have to find a cure and hopes there is one.
151211.title: SneezeGirl tries to subdue Gina

choices: SneezeGirl goes after them
SneezeGirl sees if Gina is alright
15122.content:
Jane goes running into the clearing where Dog Master is, "Ok, Dog Master," She shouts, "It's time to take you to the pound!"

"SneezeGirl!" he shouted in surprise, "I never thought you'd be here!" He orders his remaining dogs to attack, but SneezeGirl sniffs a small handful of pepper and lets out a super sneeze. "WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH, WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH-KAAAAAAAAAAAAACOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!" And blows the dogs and Dog Master 50 feet away. She then takes a packet of red pepper, inhales it and does a flaming sneeze at the small truck where the drugs are. "KKKKKKKKK, KKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKK-AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAACHHHAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAOOOOOOOO OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!" The truck explodes destroying all the drugs.

"Blast," says Dog Master, "I wasn't prepared for SneezeGirl!" He, his dogs and the two drug men quickly get into his car and drive off.
15122.title: Jane goes it alone

choices: Jand and Gina just continue to watch
They both approach the aliens
152.content:
Gina couldn't believe her eyes, but there it was, a for real alien spacecraft. Why do aliens always land in deserted areas, Gina wondered.

She ran to tell Jane about what she saw. Jane did think it was a far fetched story when she heard, but since she was a superheroine with super sneezing powers maybe it wasn't so far fetched. She went back with Gina where she saw the aliens and sure enough they were still there.

Jane could see a flying saucer the size of a baseball dymond and around it were 3 feet tall, orange aliens with only one eye in the middle of their forehead.

"Do you think they want to take over the world?" Gina asked.

"How should I know?" Jane said.
152.title: An alien spacecraft

choices: Jane says she's Sneezegirl
Jane doesn't say she's SneezeGirl
1522.content:
The aliens don't look like any threat so the two of them quietly approach.

When the aliens see them one says, "Greeting, earthlings. Do not be afraid, we mean you no harm."

Gina whispers to Jane, "They're from another planet, of course they speak English." She then giggled.

"We are having a great dilemma on our world and seek the help of the one you call SneezeGirl." The alien said.

Jane isn't sure what to say. Though she always wants to help others this might be some sort of trick by someone to learn her identity.
1522.title: They both approach the aliens

info.brief_description: The story of a superheroine who saves her city with super sneezes.
info.description:
Jane Marigold, is an ordinary popular student at her high school. But unbeknownst to her classmates, Jane is actually SneezeGirl, the teenage superheroine who saves her city with her superpowered sneezes. These are her adventures

Jane/SneezeGirl-Jane is 15 years old. She has black hair, brown eyes and flawless skin. She's a gorgeous young girl who hasn't let popularity go to her head. She is also the superpowered heroine Sneezegirl who always uses her powers for good.

Super Sneeze Powers
Danger Sense-sneezes when there's trouble
Super Sneeze- her rudimentary power. Akin to Superman's Superbreath, SneezeGirl unleashes a burst of wind with a super powerful sneeze. Used to fly with by sneezing herself in the air
Super Inhale- Sneezegirl inhales through her nose with the force of a powerful vacuum sucking thing into her nose, usually sneezing them out with great force.
Booger Blast-Sneezes out rock hard boogers that bombard her enemies.
Snot Storm-Sneezes out streams of snot that either act as an oil slick, or hardens around her enemies.
Flaming Sneeze-Used only as a last resort. After inhaling red pepper, SneezeGirl sneezes out a stream of fire.

She saves her town from many evildoers, but has a love/hate relationship with cane-wielding teenage gentleman thief called "Gambler". She often fails to catch him, but they constantly flirt with each other during their fights. Unbeknownst to either of them they attend the same school, where he's known as a quiet nerd. Her most prized possession is a handkerchief that he gave her during their first encounter. Which she still carries with her and uses.

This is her story. The story of a sneezing superheroine.
